title: Implement templates gallery
description: Add templates browser, define template JSON format, implement apply-template flow to populate project.json, and UI to open/apply templates.
steps_for_ai: Create templates folder: packages/frontend/src/templates/ with sample template JSON and assets
Add UI component TemplateBrowser that lists templates and shows preview
Implement applyTemplate(templateId) to merge template into current project state and persist to storage/projects/*.json
Add unit tests for template JSON parsing and apply logic
